description:
The digital chess teacher is back! This time, he will teach you chess through memorable matches from the Chess Championships.

- Learn the theory behind historical matches played by masters
- Find out why chess pros chose the moves they did
- Play hypothetical outcomes to understand why the losing player resigned
- 450+ "best-move" chess puzzles from memorable matches
- Memorable matches organized by chess Masters in 48 chapters
- Have fun with BOT.vinnik's peculiar sense of humor!
name: BOT.vinnik Chess 2
